icontool(1) General Commands Manual icontool(1)

NAME

icontool —
tool for testing and debugging IconServices.

SYNOPSIS

icontool [-abcd] [-a path] [file] [file ...] arg0 arg2 ...

DESCRIPTION

icontool a tool for testing and debugging IconServices. Allows the user to dump the cache content, clear the cache, etc.

FILES

/usr/local/bin/icontool
executable

SEE ALSO

iconservicesagent iconservicesd
8/9/12 Darwin
